Sofia Kovalevskaya works as a researcher for the Center for Research on the History and Culture of Science and Technology at the Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology. Her research focuses on the history of Soviet physics and mathematics, particularly on the role of women in the development of Soviet physics and mathematics. She has published widely on topics such as the history of Soviet physics, the history of women in science and mathematics in the Soviet Union, and Soviet physics during the Cold War.
